name: Gamer Networkâ€™s EGX
description: EGX is a trade fair for video games organised by Gamer Network and held annually in the United Kingdom and Germany.

name: Tokyo Game Show
description: Tokyo Game Show, commonly known as TGS, is a video game trade fair and convention held annually in September in the Makuhari Messe, in Chiba, Japan. It is presented by the Computer Entertainment Supplier's Association and Nikkei Business Publications, Inc.

name: GTR Conference 2023

name: Global Top Round Conference 2023
